name: cetus-aggregator
description: A Claude Code skill for working with the Cetus Aggregator SDK to execute optimized swaps across multiple Sui DEXs
author: Claude Code

examples.code: const mnemonics = process.env.MNEMONICS!; const keypair = Ed25519Keypair.deriveKeypair(mnemonics, 'm/44\'/784\'/0\'/0\'/0\''); const client = new AggregatorClient({ signer: keypair.toSuiAddress(), client: suiClient, env: Env.Mainnet });

examples.description: Execute query swap with profit condition
Find optimal routes across multiple DEXs
examples.code: const routers = await client.findRouters({ from: '0x2::sui::SUI', target: '0x06864a6f921804860930db6ddbe2e16acdf8504495ea7481637a1c8b9a8fe54b::cetus::CETUS', amount: new BN(1000000000), byAmountIn: true, providers: ['CETUS','SCALLOP','AFTERMATH','FLOWXV3','AFSUI','STEAMM','VOLO','KRIYAV3','KRIYA','ALPHAFI','FLOWX','BLUEMOVE','DEEPBOOKV3','BLUEFIN','HAEDAL','TURBOS','SPRINGSUI','HAWAL','OBRIC','FERRA','MAGMA']}) });

examples.description: Execute fast router swap with automatic coin management
examples.code: const txb = new Transaction(); await client.fastRouterSwap({ router: routers, txb, slippage: 0.01, refreshAllCoins: true }); const result = await client.client.signAndExecuteTransaction({transaction: txb, signer: keypair});
